sneakers.name: Nike Air Max 90
sneakers.title: A classic Nike silhouette with iconic Air Max cushioning.
sneakers.description: Lace up and feel the legacy in the champion running shoe that helped define the ‘90s. Worn by presidents, revolutionized through collabs and celebrated through rare colorways, its striking visuals, Waffle outsole, and exposed Air cushioning keep it alive and well

sneakers.name: Adidas Stan Smith
sneakers.title: A minimalist tennis shoe known for its clean design.
sneakers.description: For 50 years, the adidas Stan Smith Shoes have been a staple on the courts and on the streets. Their minimalist style is the very definition of effortless cool. But even icons have to change to stay rooted in the present, which is why this version of the trainers is created with recycled materials. It's part of our effort and commitment to help end plastic waste.

sneakers.name: Converse Chuck 70 High
sneakers.title: A modern take on the classic Chuck Taylor design with enhanced comfort.
sneakers.description: We're bringing our 1970 heritage design forward with premium comfort, durability and fit.

sneakers.name: New Balance 574
sneakers.title: A versatile sneaker with a retro-inspired design and comfortable cushioning.
sneakers.description: The most New Balance shoe ever says it all, right? No, actually. The 574 might be our unlikeliest icon. The 574 was built to be a reliable shoe that could do a lot of different things well rather than as a platform for revolutionary technology, or as a premium materials showcase. This unassuming, unpretentious versatility is exactly what launched the 574 into the ranks of all-time great

sneakers.name: Vans Authentic
sneakers.title: A classic skate shoe with a simple canvas upper and signature waffle outsole.
sneakers.description: The Authentic is the original Vans silhouette. First introduced in 1966 and driven forward by creative culture ever since, this time-honored shoe keeps the old school vibe alive with sturdy canvas uppers in seasonal colorways. With its classic low-top design and iconic rubber waffle outsole, the Authentic is a blank canvas for creativity that allows you to do your thing in your own unique way

sneakers.name: Reebok Club C 85
sneakers.title: A timeless sneaker with a soft leather upper and cushioned sockliner.
sneakers.description: Smooth is how you roll. Now, you have the kicks to match. Slip on these Club C 85 sneakers and hit the scene. A simple style means these supple leather shoes pair up with anything. Because sometimes you don't have to say anything to make a statemen

sneakers.name: Under Armour HOVR Phantom 2
sneakers.title: A lightweight running shoe with responsive cushioning for long-distance comfort.
sneakers.description: Distance runners need a perfect mix of cushion, bounce, durability, and efficiency. And that's exactly what you're getting with the UA HOVR™ Turbulence—responsive cushioning, a smooth ride, and miles of comfort.

sneakers.name: Reebok Classic Leather
sneakers.title: The Reebok Classic Leather is an iconic sneaker featuring a soft leather upper and comfortable cushioning.
sneakers.description: Clean, minimalist design keeps your look forever fresh. These Reebok Classic Leather Shoes update the iconic retro style. A supple leather upper and logos pulled from the archives give you trainers that always work, no matter what you pair them with.

sneakers.name: ASICS Gel-Lyte III
sneakers.title: The ASICS Gel-Lyte III is a classic sneaker known for its unique split-tongue design and superior comfort.
sneakers.description: The GEL-LYTE III OG sneaker emerges once again with its original shape and tooling that it featured in the early 1990s. Designed by Shigeyuki Mitsui in 1990, the GEL-LYTE III silhouette retains its iconic split-tongue formation. It was a feature that initially debuted on the GEL-LD RACER shoe. Meanwhile, key components, like its signature GEL technology unit in the midsole, provide everyday comfort.

sneakers.name: Saucony Jazz Original
sneakers.title: The Saucony Jazz Original is a retro running sneaker featuring a suede and nylon upper with a cushioned EVA midsole.
sneakers.description: The Jazz Original is time tested for comfort and wins our award for effortless style. Plus, these fashion sneakers come with a secondary set of laces so that you can make sure they work with what you’ve got going on

sneakers.name: RAMZEE - Stövletter
sneakers.title: The Ramzee Chelsea Boot is an edgy take on a classic style.
sneakers.description: The Ramzee Chelsea Boot is an edgy take on a classic style. The boot is constructed with a luxury leather upper that features elastic inserts and a pull-on loop for easy entry. Crafted for a more contemporary look, the style features a chunky, profiled outsole for an elevated feel. For added warmth and comfort the boot is detailed with a wool insole and wool lining.

sneakers.name: LA TRAINER UNISEX - Sneakers
sneakers.title: The Ramzee Chelsea Boot is an edgy take on a classic style.
sneakers.description: The Ramzee Chelsea Boot is an edgy take on a classic style. The boot is constructed with a luxury leather upper that features elastic inserts and a pull-on loop for easy entry. Crafted for a more contemporary look, the style features a chunky, profiled outsole for an elevated feel. For added warmth and comfort the boot is detailed with a wool insole and wool lining.
